samples.question: And how do you save money?
samples.transcript: I have this account only for saving The net money never comes out unless I go on a trip So I have that account So when I get my monthly paycheck from where I work I put about 80 of the whole money in that account and I only spent that 20 leftovers and when I get some little amount of money from my grandparents or my parents or any other relatives I also collect that money and I put it at that account Okay.

samples.question: And do you usually use a card or cash?
samples.transcript: I usually use cards, but in winter season I carry a little amount of cash, maybe like 5,000 won or so. Because you know, at winter there are lots of winter only foods such as 붕어빵 or 호떡 and I really love those stuff. And those people usually only, get cash only. So I try to carry some money around those times. that will do us for part one.

samples.question: Alright, so could you describe a time when you found an item that someone else lost?
samples.transcript: So, I found a wallet near Gyeongbokgung. It was about two years ago. I found it near a bench in front of Gyeongbokgung. And when I found it, I asked my friend if we should take it to a near police station. But we are really worried because right before going to Gyeongbokgung, we saw a news about lost and found items fraud. Because in the news, someone like picked a wallet that someone just like put somewhere and there were like drugs in it. Yeah, and the person who collected the wallet got into a serious problem. So we were worried we might go through similar stuff. So we discussed what we should do about the wallet, but we decided to take it because the wallet seemed really fine and it was not a fabric wallet. It was one of those see-through wallets, you know, like very clear with like made out of rubber. So, it would be just safe to like take it and put it at the police station. So, yeah, that is exactly what I did. Very nice. that is a minute and 20 seconds total. Okay.

samples.question: So yeah, what kind of people tend to lose things more often than others?
samples.transcript: In my opinion, I think people who carry small bags tend to lose stuff more than people who carry big bags. Because when people have small bags, they have to put their stuff in their pockets. And you know, like, most pockets are, like, not very, safe to put because some pockets have zippers, but usually they do not. So when they run or like walk really fast the thing that they put in could like easily fall out But then people carry really big bags like the bag I actually carry today they can like put it wherever in that one big bag So it like very unlikely to lose something And what is the first thing that people should do if they realize they lose, they have lost something? I guess it depends on what that item is. If it is an electrical device such as an, maybe an iPad or iPhone, you could check it on Google or other iPhone related apps. So, that is how they can easily find their electrical item. But if it is not an electrical item or if they have never put those apple tags on that item, then I think they should ask their companion who like went through the day with. Because they might be able to remember where they put it. So I think that could be a one nice way to find what they lost.

samples.question: And how can people like prevent losing things?
samples.transcript: I think labeling stuff is one nice way. I have like pouches for each stuff and on that pouch I have like labeled stuff, Label stuff like for like one example chargers in that pouch I have a phone charger and iPad charger and heater charger for like winter season and another label pouch is like for makeups I have like my cosmetics in there and also my hand sanitizer and yeah that really makes me help not to lose stuff. Yes.

samples.question: So what is the purpose of having zoos?

samples.question: And what is your opinion about animals being kept in zoos?
samples.transcript: For me, I think I feel kind of bad for the animals at the zoo, at the zoo, because they do not have, they do not seem to have freedom. So I prefer to see them in the wild because that makes me feel kind of comfortable because animals should be more having freedom than just being kept captured at the zoo And how do you think zoos could be improved For me, I think the zoo skippers should make the zoo in the forest, in the wild nature.
